functional.notes: Test asserts zero present ball records when detector is disabled, strengthening trust-first guarantees.

correctness_safety.notes: Regression guard prevents accidental hallucination bugs.
evidence: pipeline/tests/test_run_video_v1.py checks pos_state != present for ball when detector disabled

performance.notes: Test uses small synthetic frames; no performance impact.

security.notes: No security concerns in test layer.

maintainability.notes: Clear assertion pattern; easy to adapt for future trust-first requirements.
evidence: pipeline/tests/test_run_video_v1.py uses explicit loop over track records

summary.notes: Strong regression test for trust-first behavior.
